name: Lava Ball Wars - Flippy Bump
description:
Move your finger, control the direction and knock players off the larva platforms with your bumper ball made with car.

You can make one giant fireball or a number of small balls... and you can bump it directly to the opponent or snipe them with it... it is totally up to you.

Now you have a perfect chance to battle with your friends, classmates and colleagues or anyone else around the world!
